entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
